description: Discover how blockchain technology can revolutionize digital identity management by enhancing security, user control, and data efficiency. This overview delves into blockchain's attributes like decentralization, security, and interoperability, and its applications in sectors such as finance and healthcare.
keywords: Blockchain, Digital Identity, Data Security, Decentralization, Self-Sovereign Identity, User Control, Data Integrity, Privacy, Interoperability, Financial Services, Healthcare, Public Services, Digital Ecosystem
title: Blockchain and Digital Identity: Securing the Future in a Digital Age
